publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2251 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion-That the Parliament agrees as a revision to the Business Motion agreed on 20 September 2001- Wednesday 26 September 2001 after Time for Reflection, insert followed by Ministerial statement on the Scottish Executive's Response to the Report of the Care Development Group Supported by: Euan Robson*
